onna ohoma nagim bahim ekka ape aadare warthamanayata aawa,dan api therum aran inne hurathal katha nathuwath ba kiyala,ee nisa api chuttak chuttak hurathal katha katha karanawa,yaluwo wage idalamath ba kiyalath apita theruna,ee nisa api wihilu ka්raganna eka awasthawata uchitha widiyata sakasa gaththa,dan apita katha ka්ranna dewal walinuth aduwak na,mokada issa්ra api dhanathmaka adahas gana witharayi katha kale,dan yatharthaya gana katha karanna baya na api..me thathweta eenna awurudu ganak giya..dan mata hithaganna puluwan sthayi una paramanuwakata danenne kohomada kiyala..kohoma unath awankawama mata dan danenawa ape aadare adwans kiyala… ~wadakarayo~ mata meka dakkama hina giya pana yanakan..balanna oyalatath ehemada kiyala..“kohoma ha්ri pana yagena eeddi nawaththaganna,hode..nathnam ma්ranaya blog eke thamayi nawathinna wenne!” ~ehen mehen~ mata meka dakkama hina giya pana yanakan..balanna oyalatath ehemada kiyala..“kohoma ha්ri pana yagena eeddi nawaththaganna,hode..nathnam ma්ranaya blog eke thamayi nawathinna wenne!” ~sulaga enu pinisa~ kohoma patan gannada..hmmmm..thahanam pinthurayak unata matath meka balaganna hambuna torant wala pihiten..liyanna hithuna ee watina chiththa්rapataya gana wachanayak..
